summary: This module implements a collection of web handlers and helper utilities for the Open Library platform. It defines routes for operations such as adding authors or books, retrieving edition pages, performing health checks, editing YAML configurations, and accessing external bibliographic services (ISBN lookup, MARCXML, OPDS, RDF, etc.). The code also includes generic helpers for request processing, permission checks, and template setup.
business_intent: Enable the Open Library application to expose a RESTful API and web endpoints that allow internal and external clients to create, read, and manage bibliographic records, monitor service health, and integrate with external metadata sources, thereby supporting the library's cataloging and discovery functions.
